name: Waller, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien and Keim, JJ.
parties: Waller, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.
attorneys: Robert M. Landis, with him Gerald F. Flood, Jr., and Dechert, Price & Rhoads, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Waller, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Railroad Company.
Argued November 16, 1962.
January 8, 1963:
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Beien and Keim, JJ.
Lawrence J. Richette, for appellants.
Robert M. Landis, with him Gerald F. Flood, Jr., and Dechert, Price & Rhoads, for appellee.
